mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, MAIL_SUBJECT, USER_ID, MAIL_CONTENTS FROM T_HRD_MAILCONTETNS
SELECT USER_ID, EMP_NO, EMAIL, EMAILMAIN, KORN_NM, REGI_NUMB FROM T_SYTM_USER WHERE USER_FLAG_CD = 'RW'

SELECT USER_ID , WORK_DATE , WORK_SEQ , WORK_TYPE , WORK_CONTENTS , WORK_TIME FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND WORK_DATE BETWEEN #{WORK_FDATE} AND #{WORK_TDATE} ORDER BY WORK_DATE, WORK_TYPE, WORK_SEQ
SELECT USER_ID , WORK_DATE , WORK_SEQ , WORK_TYPE , WORK_CONTENTS , WORK_TIME FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND WORK_DATE = #{WORK_DATE} ORDER BY WORK_TYPE, WORK_SEQ

SELECT USER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') AS WORK_DATE , WORK_SEQ , WORK_TYPE , WORK_CONTENTS , WORK_TIME FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND WORK_DATE = (SELECT MAX(WORK_DATE) FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}) ORDER BY WORK_TYPE, WORK_SEQ

SELECT USER_ID , WORK_DATE , WORK_SEQ , WORK_TYPE AS WORK_TYPE_T , WORK_CONTENTS AS WORK_CONTENTS , WORK_TIME FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND WORK_DATE = #{WORK_DATE} AND WORK_TYPE = 'T'
UNION ALL
SELECT USER_ID , WORK_DATE , WORK_SEQ , WORK_TYPE , WORK_CONTENTS , WORK_TIME FROM T_HRD_WORKDAY WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND WORK_DATE = #{WORK_DATE} AND WORK_TYPE = 'W'
ORDER BY WORK_TYPE, WORK_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HRD_WORKDAY (USER_ID, WORK_DATE, WORK_SEQ, WORK_TYPE, WORK_CONTENTS, WORK_TIME, INPT_ID, INPT_DTTM, CHGE_ID, CHGE_DTTM) VALUES( #{USER_ID}, #{WORK_DATE}, #{WORK_SEQ}, #{WORK_TYPE}, #{WORK_CONTENTS}, #{WORK_TIME}, #{USER_ID_SRV}, NOW(), #{USER_ID_SRV}, NOW() )
